title: A bad high school term paper
review: The problem with this film is that while Oliver Stone continually ducks behind the curtain defending himself that he was only making a work of fiction , he uses enough historical imagery and data that the end product is as I have described it in the " one line description : " a bad history term paper .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: I"ll not recount the historical inaccuracies that permeate the film concerning the individuals involved save to note that attempting to make a hero of Jim Garrison would be laughable if the reputations otherwise damaged in the film did not belong to real people .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: I would encourage anyone who believes that the character Kevin Costner portrayed bore any philosophical or intellectual similarity to Jim Garrison should read a biography of Garrison some time .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: He knew he had no case , he knew his " star witness " was perjuring himself .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: But the call to glory was too great for Garrison to let those " little inconveniences " get in his way .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: The real life Jim Garrison ultimately lost his case against Clay Shaw and Stone loses his case as well by attempting to glue together a variety of conspiracy theories , many of which had been debunked long before the release of the film in 1991 .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: The problem , however , is that those theories are presented in " JFK " as historical verities , and large numbers of viewers haven"t the historical grounding in the facts of the assassination and the scores of investigations conducted since to know where Stone is taking " artistic license " and the actual facts of the case .

title: A bad high school term paper
review: The result is that actual people end up being smeared by innuendo and " factual evidence " long since discredited .
